about_the_game:
Set Content
This set unlocks the new playable character Sandalphon and comes with useful items to get him started.

• Supreme Primarch's Awe Sandalphon-Unique Sigil
• Canaan Whitebloom x 3
• Azurite's Splendor x 10
• Ambrosia x 5

The full game is required to use this content. You may also need to update the game to the newest version.

Downloaded content can be obtained by visiting the Knickknack Shack in game and selecting Claim Add-Ons.
